snippet: Morgan Stanley named new heads of mergers and acquisitions for the Americas and for Europe on Friday after a management reshuffling brought on by the impending departure of the senior deal maker Paul Taubman.
abstract: Morgan Stanley named new heads of mergers and acquisitions for the Americas and for Europe on Friday after a management reshuffling brought on by the impending departure of the senior deal maker Paul Taubman.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Names New Regional Chiefs for Mergers Unit
